settings.chooseAccentColor: Choose your preferred accent color for the launcher
settings.chooseBackgroundEffect: Choose a background effect for the launcher
settings.chooseGameDataLocation: Choose a custom location to store game data (worlds, mods, libraries, etc.)
settings.configureCommands: Configure custom commands to run before, during, and after game launch
settings.viewLicensesDescription: View licenses for code and components from third parties
settings.selectLanguage: Choose the language for the launcher interface

hooks.preLaunchDescription: Command to run before Minecraft starts. If this command fails, the launch will be aborted.
hooks.wrapperDescription: Wrapper command to run Java through (e.g., sandboxing tools). The Java path will be passed as an argument.
hooks.postExitDescription: Command to run after Minecraft exits successfully. Runs in the background without blocking.
hooks.warningText: These hooks execute system commands with full permissions. Only use commands you trust and understand. Invalid commands may prevent Minecraft from launching or cause security issues.

tooltips.autoUpdates: Automatically check for and download launcher updates when available.
tooltips.discordPresence: Show your current game and launcher status in Discord. Displays what you're playing to friends.
tooltips.betaUpdates: Receive beta versions and pre-release updates. These may be unstable and contain bugs.
tooltips.experimentalMode: Enable experimental features and unstable functionality. May cause crashes or unexpected behavior.
tooltips.openLogs: Automatically open the game logs window when launching Minecraft. Useful for debugging issues.
tooltips.hideWindow: Automatically hide the launcher window when Minecraft starts. Reduces desktop clutter during gameplay.
tooltips.concurrentDownloads: Maximum number of files downloaded simultaneously. Lower values reduce bandwidth usage but slow downloads.
tooltips.concurrentIoOperations: Maximum number of files written to disk simultaneously. Lower values reduce disk stress and I/O errors.
tooltips.borderRadius: Adjust the corner roundness of all UI elements. 0px is square (Minecraft-style), higher values make corners more rounded.

profiles.createFirstProfile: Create your first profile to get started

capes.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this cape? This action cannot be undone.
